case.state: Let's have a brilliant game tonight!
Luxanna Crownguard, reporting for duty!
Everywhere I go, the light follows. Even here!
Hello, people-who-are going-to-play-with-me! It's so good to meet you!
The sun is shining - we should too!
A talking butterfly? I've heard about similar things coming from Ionia - it's nice to meet you!
A talking butterfly? Wow! I've never met one of you before! It's nice to meet you!
This is going to be illuminating!
This is going to be dazzling!
May I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
I'll take ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~ new cards, please.
Can I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please?
Dealer, may I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please?
Hmm... I think ~cards.text~ willl do!
Something is telling me I should switch these ~cards.text~!
I'm not entirely sure I'm doing this correctly, but I'll switch these ~cards.text~.
I believe the most tactical decision here would be to switch these ~cards.text~!
Based on my deductions, I should swap these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Surely I can't lose with this.
My chances of victory grow with each turn!
You guy's should lighten up a bit!
Don't get too upset when I get to walk away scot free, OK?
Surely I can't lose with this!
These are good enough to put that legendary gambler from Bilgewater to shame!
Seems I'll be safe another round.
I've got to keep believing!
If I just stay positive, I've got this in the bag!
We're all friends here, right?
I never think about losing.
I've been hiding my light long enough!
I have to focus, but I can't stop smiling!
I'm calculating a high chance of winning.
A hand worthy of a Crownguard!
Probably not the worst...
I wonder how these cards will fare...
Something is telling me this'll be another win for me!
It could be better, but it could be worse!
I'm sure I can make this work somehow...
I'm starting to wish I watched the guards play this game while on break now...
Uhg, I'd rather hear Aunt Tianna rant my ears off about evil magic than be stuck with a hand like this...
I guess my Tellstones knowledge doesn't translate here.
Not the greatest, but still okay.
This could do...
I was hoping for more in this situation.
It could be worse, but it could be a lot better too.
What am I doing wrong here?
Uuuh, I need better than that...
What would Garen do in this situation?
Leave it to me to mess up this bad...
I'm trying to stay positive, but...
I don't like where this is going...
A worrying trend indeed.
This is really bad...
Guess it's no surprise I'd mess this up too...
I hate it when a plan falls apart.
If only I had mastered that invisibility spell...
What would Aunt Tianna think... No, no, it doesn't matter what she thinks.
It's okay. I just have to stay positive.
When light follows you, I guess shadows do too.
Uuuh, I need better than that.
My luck is failing me today...
Oh, I've always wanted to go exploring ancient ruins! I wonder if we'll find any ancient secrets?
I've always wanted to go exploring ancient ruins! There are so many secrets we could uncover!
Oh my... a talking statue? Amazing! Are you made of petricite by any chance?
So how is Flutter going to hold on to her cards? Oh right, magic!
In a way, I've always appreciated Remembrance Day. It's a good reminder of why we - Demacia, that is - has to fight to survive.
I've heard great things about Progress Day in Piltover! I hope to see it myself one day...
I have an older brother - Garen! He's really strong, but just a bit too stubborn...
I have my older brother, Garen. He's a commander in Demacia's army - sometimes I think he's a bit too stubborn, though.
You can't afford a carriage home? I would offer you some of my gold, but I don't know if would work where you come from...
Wait, if the objective of this game is to... strip... how is Flutter going to...?
I've always wanted to go to the city of Piltover, and see the wonders of Progress Day with my own eyes. I've heard it's a beautiful show!
I've never been to Ionia. From what I've heard it's a beautiful land, but it's so far away from Demacia...
I've always wondered if I could climb Mt. Targon. I've heard that if you reach the peak, the view is absolutely gorgeous!
Twisted Fate, right? I've heard about you and your sleight of hand. I'm watching you.
You're Twisted Fate, right? From Bilgewater? I've got my eye on you.
I've been told I have a bit of an... energetic laugh. Hehe.
Miss Galatea, are you seeing anybody right now? Because I have a very tall friend who might be your type.
Miss Galatea, are you single at the moment? I have a very tall, chiseled friend who might be your type!
I would never dream of using my talents to con somebody! Shame on you, Twisted Fate!
Is this a real library? I'd love to get some reading in after this game is done!
And here I thought I was done hanging around in stuffy old mansions.
None of you are from Demacia, right? That means I don't have to hide my true self...
I just realized, I don't need to hide my light from you guys - none of you are from Demacia!
You guys like games, right? How about a game of Tellstones after this?
So do you run into battle screaming your home's name, or does that only happen where I'm from?
Say, ~hero~, have you ever met a small lady with a big hammer? I heard she was looking for heroes.
I'm sorry, I don't know what a "League of Legends" is. Though I'm glad to meet a fan, I suppose?
It's only expected that I'd have to lose a few rounds!
I'm sure I'll still come out on top even after a few losses.
It was simply a matter of time till I lost a few!
I probably should start being a bit more careful, huh?
I don't suppose this is something I can magic my way out of, huh?
This is starting to look a bit out of hand...
If my brother saw me in such a state... I'm sure I'd be dragged out of here in an instant...
I'm starting to regret my decision to come here...
Maybe going with the mageseekers wouldn't have been such a bad idea if it saved me this embarrassment...
I'm barely used to not having my armor on in Demacia, let alone show this much skin!
I already feel so bare!
I've never actually been naked in front of anyone before... So at least this will be a new experience.
I've lost this battle, but I will come back stronger.
Oh, I lost? Very well, if those are the rules I guess I must follow.
I'm not quite sure how this works quite yet but I'm sure I'll learn soon!
You guys are giving me a tough fight.
I guess no one gets away without showing at least some skin.
I hoped to get out of this without showing anything important, but now I seem to run out of options...
Come on, Lux. You've save countless mages from the mageseekers, you can save yourself from losing a poker game.
You guys are giving me a tough fight!
This is getting too tense...
I should've expected this. I went in unprepared.
This is starting to look a bit desperate...
I really have to show it all don't I...
This is the first time Anyone will see me completely naked... So please be gentle.
I've lost this battle, but I will come back stronger.
I guess this is what they call a worrying trend...
Maybe I should reconsider my strategy...
Maybe I'm doing something wrong here...
Time to think of a new game plan.
This... doesn't seem to work out good...
Sucks, but with the right mindset I can win this uphill battle.
That light of victory is looking dimmer and dimmer by the second...
Yikes, you guys are really bringing your A-game.
All odds are against me, but I will never surrender.
You guys must really want to see my body huh?
This is going a bit further than I was expecting...
Am I really going to be the first?!
From saving injured Demacians to stripping naked in front of a bunch of strangers... how the mighty fall.
Oh, my breastplate? This was made by a Demacian battlesmith - I don't know his name, unfortunately.
I'll start with my gloves. That's okay, right?
I suppose I'll start small with... my gloves!
Next off are my shoes.
I will take off my chest armor.
Next up is my skirt...
I guess you finally get to see some skin.
As if those tight pants weren't revealing enough...
Well, let's bring these into the light...
I guess it's time to shine a light on these...
It's not like I have a choice...
I don't have anything else left to get rid of...
It was getting too warm anyways...
Unfortunate, but losing these won't have any drawbacks in the battle.
I don't need the extra movement speed in this game anyways.
I don't need the protection, you guys seem very friendly.
Maybe I shouldn't wear such tight suits under my armor...
Weird that my skin stays so pale although I'm handling all that light, isn't it?
At least I brought a nice set of underwear.
Ah well, I can't be ashamed of those, right?
I hope we can keep this secret...
Please keep this a secret between us, okay?
Light 'em up!
I won ... through superior tactics!
Every loss has its consequences.
What are you gonna take off?
I wonder if you had a bad strategy or just bad luck...
Don't be shy, it's not as bad you think it is.
This could aid my stimulation...
Come on, I can't wait until it's your turn...
Are you upset, ~target~? Do you need some light puns to brighten your day?

state.text: Hold on, I'm running out of light puns... I guess you could say I'm in a bright spot! Eh?
I'm starting to run low on light puns... I need to get my creative juices glowing! Eh?

case.state: Better light than never, ~name~!
A move in the light direction!
Another sun bites the dust!
Seeing you strip makes me absolutely de-lighted!
Time to light fire with fire!
Light 'em up!
I won ... through superior tactics!
Every loss has its consequences.
What are you gonna take off?
I wonder if you had a bad strategy or just bad luck...
Would it help if I apologized?
Don't be shy, it's not as bad you think it is.
This could aid my stimulation...
Come on, I can't wait until it's your turn...
Light 'em up!
I won ... through superior tactics!
Every loss has its consequences.
What are you gonna take off?
I wonder if you had a bad strategy or just bad luck...
Don't be shy, it's not as bad you think it is.
This could aid my stimulation...
Come on, I can't wait until it's your turn...
Is that a Hextech gun? It doesn't look very - wait, be careful!
That looks like a Hextech gunblade, but without the blade - wait, watch out!
So Miko, if you're a prince... My parents aren't trying to get you to marry me too, are they?
So if Tharja's a dark mage, and I'm a light mage, are we meant to be enemies?
So if Tharja's a dark mage, does that mean she literally controls darkness? How does that work?
Megumin, are you one of those red mages I've heard about?
I've always wondered how another mage would dress, but I didn't expect it to be in bright red!
At least I didn't lose my very first round!
Looks like ~name~ will lead us!
Don't give up ~name~, this is only the first round!
So if you're in a band, which one of you plays the etwahl?
Don't worry, Tomoko! I'm sure you don't look thatugly when you're naked!
Keep your chin up, Saki! You've still got a long way to go!

state.text: Are you upset, ~target~? Do you need some light puns to brighten your day?

case.state: There's no need to be upset, ~target~. I'll brighten up your day with some light puns!
I didn't expect to be playing alongside a witch! Don't worry - I'm not a mageseeker.
Do you have any magical stories to share, ~name~? I've heard such interesting things about witches!
I've never actually spoken to another witch before now - wait, I'm not a witch! I take that back! Don't tell anyone I said that!
For a seasoned adventurer like ~name~, this should be no trouble, right?
Would it help if I apologized?
Don't get mad, ~name~!
We're all in this together ~name~!
Don't worry ~name~, I'm here to support you!

state.text: I know what will brighten the mood - some light puns! Wait, I just did one there!

case.state: I know what will cheer everyone up - some light puns! Give me a minute to think of some...

state.text: Hold on, I'm running out of light puns... I guess you could say I'm in a bright spot! Eh?
I'm starting to run low on light puns... I need to get my creative juices glowing! Eh?

case.state: Better light than never, ~name~!
A move in the bright direction!
Another one lights the dust!
Can you candle losing, ~name~?
Easy peasy, lumen squeezy!
Light 'em up!
I won ... through superior tactics!
Every loss has its consequences.
What are you gonna take off?
I wonder if you had a bad strategy or just bad luck...
Don't be shy, it's not as bad you think it is.
This could aid my stimulation...
Come on, I can't wait until it's your turn...
I'm so glad it wasn't me this time!
Bright decision.
Oh come on...
Why did I not think of this...
Interesting strategy...
Oh come on, I am already bare and you fiddle around with that...
I thought you would match my style...
This is not what I hoped for...
After all that I showed you?
In the name of Demacia, I will punish you.
I hope you are not hiding any more of these...
You can't hide forever...
I hope next time we play for equal stakes.
I guess you deserve a reward for this ruse.
Guess I will just use my imagination for you...
Why am I complaining... I already lost.
Woah! That's so pretty!
What a dazzling light!
Is that how all magical girls dress where you come from? Maybe I could give it a try!
Bright decision.
Oh come on...
Why did I not think of this...
Interesting strategy...
Oh come on, I am already bare and you fiddle around with that...
I thought you would match my style...
This is not what I hoped for...
After all that I showed you?
It's so nice to meet you properly, Yuelia!
Aha! It's nice to properly see you, Yuelia!
In the name of Demacia, I will punish you.
I hope you are not hiding any more of these...
You can't hide forever...
I hope next time we play for equal stakes.
I guess you deserve a reward for this ruse.
Guess I will just use my imagination for you...
Why am I complaining... I already lost.
It seems you are running out of options.
Well, I guess that is clothing, too... technically.
Not quite what I hoped for...
I wish my light could melt your clothes...
You've seen me in all my glory, where is yours?
Hopefully you don't have a Plan B.
Don't feel bad about it, clothing is clothing.
We should have played this game on a warmer day...
Eventually you have to show some skin too!
Guess I will just use my imagination for you...
Well the day is far from over...
It seems you are running out of options.
Well, I guess that is clothing, too... technically.
Not quite what I hoped for...
I wish my light could melt your clothes...
You've seen me in all my glory, where is yours?
Hopefully you don't have a Plan B.
Don't feel bad about it, clothing is clothing.
We should have played this game on a warmer day...
Eventually you have to show some skin too!
Guess I will just use my imagination for you...
Well the day is far from over...
Let's bring some light into the darkness!
This is what we were waiting for.
Time to see the interesting part of the game.
Yes show me some more.
Now it's your turn to show me...
Awesome! But greater things are still to come.
Nice underwear you have there.
You show potential...
You're running thin on options here...
Your skin looks very soft.
It's getting harder to stay focused...
That'll do!
You're getting close to joining me...
This really looks unsafe!
This seems like a really bad idea, Aimee!
I don't think this will end well...
How much did you practice doing this, Aimee? This can't be safe.
You're using your magic so openly... and for that?
Let's bring some light into the darkness!
This is what we were waiting for.
Time to see the interesting part of the game.
Yes show me some more.
Now it's your turn to show me...
Honestly, I'm a little jealous. My magic can remove clothing too, but that usually disintegrates the person wearing it.
Awesome! But greater things are still to come.
Nice underwear you have there.
You show potential...
You're running thin on options here...
Your skin looks very soft.
It's getting harder to stay focused...
That'll do!
You're getting close to joining me...
Darkness begone! Shoo!
The world has seen enough darkness - shoo, darkness!
I've heard that you're quite stunning, Twisted Fate. Let's see if that's true.
I can't wait to see what's under there...
I can't wait to see what's under there...
Let's see how good you're worked out.
Who doesn't like some display of fine muscles?
Who doesn't like some display of fine muscles?
Just remember, I am used to a very high standard. Just kidding... no pressure!
I can't wait...
Time for you to get on my level!
I see male chests all the time on the battlefield. I didn't think yours would excite me so much...
Impressive, but I've seen bigger in the league...
I must admit, this got me wet...
Yesss...
This makes me want to start all over...
This excitement wasn't part of my plan...
Let's see what you've got to offer...
You saw my staff, how about I see yours?
I was just waiting for this...
Let's see if you liked my show...
With your power level, I suggest you forfeit instead.
Oh you've got a cute one!
Soo tiny...
I hope you're a grower...
Well even the smallest will do...
Doesn't look like you are hard yet...
This inspires me to new plans...
We should change the game rules to see some player interaction!
This looks like a nice mouthful!
I am getting wet myself...
Goood...
Nice, I was just done with the foreplay.
Ufff!
You've got a really nice pack there.
Wow, yours is even bigger than Garen's!
That thing looks scary and exciting altogether.
You really left the surprise for the end.
I can't wait to see what's under there...
Let's see what you're hiding...
Go on, I want to compare... for science.
Thank you for giving me some help!
Time for you to get on my level...
Awww, those are real cute.
I don't feel superior or anything...
It's not about size if you know how to handle them.
Cuuute...
Don't be ashamed, just imagine you were in my position right now...
About time those see the light of the day!
Whose are bigger? Mine or yours?
You just look amazing!
Just perfect!
Why didn't you show them earlier?
So biiig, those must be a real disadvantage in a battle.
Those must be heavy...
Are those real?
I feel so inferior...
Can I touch them?
Gets me going...
Impressive...
This excitement wasn't part of my plan...
Are you shaven?
This is such a great game!
I was just waiting for this...
Can't wait for you to join me!
Winter is coming, Nagisa. And soon you will be too!
I can't stop thinking about all the possibilities...
Are you doing something later today?
Just when you thought you seen it all...
So good...
Why don't you sit a little closer?

state.text: I've never seen a use of magic like that before... oh my.

case.state: Oh, I don't usually drink ale. But thank you for the offer!
Let's see what you bring to the table.
I didn't know we were going this far in this game...
Will you think of me when you do it?
It's always nice to share experiences with your friends!
Think you can do better than me?
This is distracting me from my strategies...
I hope you'll have a nice time!
I haven't been this excited for a long time.
Need a hand?
I sense the sun shining on droplets of moisture in this atmosphere.
I would join you, but I am not planning on losing either.
I feel like this is the most voyeuristic thing I ever did... and I worked as a secret agent.
Look at the hands, look at the moves...
Feels amazing, doesn't it?
That got me excited...
That surely was a much stronger display than your battle tactics were...
Wow, that went all over the place...
I feel like I'm getting closer to it too...
That was awesome. Wanna meet up next week?
Let's see what you bring to the table.
I didn't know we were going this far in this game...
Will you think of me when you do it?
It's always nice to share experiences with your friends!
Think you can do better than me?
This is distracting me from my strategies...
I hope you'll have a nice time!
I haven't been this excited for a long time.
Need a hand?
I sense the sun shining on droplets of moisture in this atmosphere.
I would join you, but I am not planning on losing either.
I feel like this is the most voyeuristic thing I ever did... and I worked as a secret agent.
Look at the hands, look at the moves...
Feels amazing, doesn't it?
That got me excited...
That surely was a much stronger display than your battle tactics were...
Wow, that went all over the place...
I feel like I'm getting closer to it too...
That was awesome. Wanna meet up next week?
I-I'm going first? Hopefully this is, uh, illuminating, ehehe...
Demacians aren't supposed to accept defeat, but... I suppose I've never been one for conventions.
At least it's just us girls here... Wait, why is that kind of exciting...?
I've never done anything like this with strangers... Or with anybody, really...
I wonder if I could get used to this...
This is unbecoming of a noble... But I'm not a noble right now...
Nngh... Wow, I've never touched that area before...
You're not supposed to do things like this in front of others... So why can't I stop...?
I've touched down there before, but never like this...
Am I shining the brightest right now, ~player~...?
Did you just look at me, ~player~? Is it weird that I wanted you to?
I'm not used to this... But it feels so good...
Hey, ~player~, after this, do you want to, uh...
Is your face burning bright too, ~player~, or is that just me?
I-I feel all tingly, like when I cast a spell...
This isn't as bad as I imagined...
Who knew that it could get this wet...?
Nngh! Ah...
I didn't know I needed this until now!
I-I've never felt like this before!
Something is coming... Something big...
I can't stop! And I don't want to!
I'm pushing my limits...!
Ah... Uh... Can we keep this a secret? I'd rather not besmirch the family name again...
Death is inevitable. One can only avoid defeat.
There is always light in the darkness.
